Key Match Events: Jamal Musiala scored a goal and set up three more as Germany demolished Hungary 5-0
Niclas Füllkrug scored the opening goal in the 27th minute
Musiala struck on the break in the 58th minute
Florian Wirtz drilled in their third after a one-two with Musiala in the 66th
Aleksandar Pavlovic got his first goal for Germany in the 77th minute
Kai Havertz converted from the penalty spot after he was brought down in the box by Willi Orban
Pre-Game Insights: All eyes were on Jamal Musiala, Wirtz and Havertz ahead of the match as many expect them to lead a new generation in Germany along with new captain Joshua Kimmich
Post-Match Reflections: Germany travel to face the Netherlands in Amsterdam on Tuesday, while Hungary host Bosnia and Herzegovina
Others: Following the summer's 2024 European Championships on home soil, former captain Ilkay Gündogan and mainstays and World Cup winners Toni Kroos, Thomas Müller and Manuel Neuer retired from international football
